DOC.brief_summary: The investigators investigated whether a strictly controlled pain management with patients participating in a clinical study can attenuate persistence of post-thoracotomy pain. The investigators also wanted to find out whether NSAID + intravenous patient-controlled analgesia with morphine is an efficacious alternative to thoracic epidural analgesia.
DOC.brief_title: NSAIDs With Morphine-PCA Compared to Epidural Analgesia in Thoracotomy Pain
